name: Parasitic Override
description:
In "Parasitic Override", you play as a robotic parasite that can take control of enemy robots to survive and thrive in a hostile world. Navigate through challenging levels and use your ability to jump from host to host, leaving a trail of chaos and destruction in your wake. Face off against powerful bosses and upgrade your abilities to gain greater control over the robotic landscape. Can you outlast your enemies and become the ultimate machine parasite?

Controls:-

WASD: for Movement(Tank Controls)

W and S for Movement

A and D for rotation

E: in Parasite form for Hack

Left-Mouse-Button: To Shoot

GitHub Repository: https://github.com/TheHarmacist97/Brackeys-GameJam-9

2D Assets: Icons8 and Kenny assets
Music:

  • Broken Reality: Kevin MacLeod
  • Lovers Squared: Letter Box
